org.treetank.api

Interface INode

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DumbNodeFactory.DumbNode, NodePage.DeletedNode

    public interface INode
    Overall INode-Interface for the interaction with the page-layer. All persistence functionality must be handled over this interface while all node-layers interfaces inherit from this interface.
    Author:
    Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getHash()
      Getting the persistent stored hash.
      long getNodeKey()
      Gets unique INode key.
      void serialize(DataOutput pOutput)
      Serializing to given dataput

               throws TTIOException

      • getNodeKey

        long getNodeKey()
        Gets unique INode key. This key should be set over the IPageWtx.incrementNodeKey for getting the correct offset within retrievals.
        Returns:
        node key

      • getHash

        long getHash()
        Getting the persistent stored hash.
        Returns:
        the hash of this INode
